document_data.name: ''Grandmaster's Armor''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''grandmaster's armor''''' was a unique suit of [[studded leather]] armor that appeared in the Realms during the midâ€“14{{th}} century.
document_data.Powers: The armor possessed a powerful ''+6 [[Item enchantment|enchantment]]''. It allowed its wearer to move twice as fast, lending to an [[assassin]]'s ability to swiftly close in on their prey.
document_data.History:
Fitting to its name, the ''grandmaster's armor'' was custom-tailored for the Grandmaster Assassin, [[Vita Muerte]] by an unnamed [[wizard]]. Grandmaster Muerte slew the wizard shortly after the armor's creation.

As of the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, the armor was in the possession of the [[Bhaalspawn]] [[Eler Had]].
